title: MacBook Pro
description: MacBook Pro 2021 with mini-LED display may launch between September, November

review.text: Amazing one. Value for money.

Performance wise it is good machine but built quality should have been more better, especially hinge portion some colour of the screen doesn't look like natural, in this price segment overall not bad with some compromise.
Overall nice laptop, except it's thermals are not upto the mark, but performance wise no complaints.
Nice laptop
